column4: Hi All ! I am new to UBUNTU but I cant get my printer installed. Can anyone help a frustrated newbie?
oh, that one's a bit bitchy
I have the networked variant running here..
do you have the samsung linux driver installed?
did you run it as root?
it does work, though :) Get the drivers from samsung then
you need to run the script as root, though
no, you need to be able to spawn X windows as root
you should log into gnome/kde/whatever as root
I am runnign KDS right now but can log back into GNOME easily
no, just log into whatever gui you use
as long as you're root and can open a window in the GUI
sn9: the samsung setup tool works fine in debian sarge
sn9 Holy crapoly this is getting complex! everything is going well so far. I am making the config file now
ok, good luck with that printer
